CF.defaultFolderDialogDescriptionL1: Any new compendium(s) will be included in this folder
CF.defaultFolderDialogDescriptionL2: Compendiums in this folder will show up as Unassigned
CF.folderDialogDescriptionL1: Any marked compendium(s) will be included in this folder.
CF.folderDialogDescriptionL2: A compendium can only belong to one folder.
CF.folderDialogDescriptionL3: Marking compendiums already assigned to other folders will move them here.
CF.clipboardNotification: Copied current folder configuration to clipboard!
CF.folderImportMaxDepth: Imported string contains folders that exceed max folder limit
CF.cleanupHint: Remove Folder Data from a Compendium
CF.cleanupL1: This will remove all folder data from a compendium
CF.exportFolderL1: You may export contained entities from this folder into an unlocked Compendium pack of the appropriate type.
CF.importFolderL1: Are you sure you want to import the folder {folder} into your world
CF.importFolderL2: Existing entities will not be overwritten, so will be duplicated
CF.importFolderL3: Folders will be created as needed
CF.importFolderL4: If a folder exists on the path it will be used
CF.createFolderWithinCompendiumL1: Folder name must be unique, else it will update existing folders on the same path
CF.deletePromptL1: Are you sure you want to delete the folder {folderName}?
CF.deletePromptL3: Compendiums in these folders will not be deleted
CF.hideMessage: Moved compendium to hidden folder. Edit a compendium folder to see hidden/unassigned folders
